pos: noun or participle which takes the aux. verb suru
noun or participle which takes the aux. verb suru
meanings: renouncing worldly desires (in order to concentrate on Buddhist teachings)

pos: noun or participle which takes the aux. verb suru

lessons.japanese: 屋根裏部屋のネズミを退治しなくてはと彼はいっている。
lessons.english: He says he must get rid of the mice that are in the attic.

lessons.japanese: われわれは彼の家のねずみを退治した。
lessons.english: We rid his house of mice.

lessons.japanese: この薬はごきぶりを退治するのに効果的だ。
lessons.english: This poison is very effective in getting rid of roaches.

lessons.japanese: しかも初陣があのドラゴン退治！
lessons.english: What's more, our first battle is to defeat that dragon!

lessons.japanese: 彼はシロアリを退治する計画を考案しようとした。
lessons.english: He tried to devise a plan for getting rid of termites.

lessons.japanese: 彼はありを退治しようと思った。
lessons.english: He tried to get rid of the ants.

lessons.japanese: 屋根裏部屋のネズミを退治しなくてはと彼はいっている。
lessons.english: He says he must get rid of the mice that are in the attic.

lessons.japanese: われわれは彼の家のねずみを退治した。
lessons.english: We rid his house of mice.

lessons.japanese: われわれは彼の家のねずみを退治した。
lessons.english: We got rid of the mice in his house.

lessons.japanese: この薬はごきぶりを退治するのに効果的だ。
lessons.english: This poison is very effective in getting rid of roaches.

lessons.japanese: 彼はありを退治しようと思った。
lessons.english: He tried to get rid of the ants.

lessons.japanese: 彼はシロアリを退治する計画を考案しようとした。
lessons.english: He tried to devise a plan for getting rid of termites.

lessons.japanese: しかも初陣があのドラゴン退治！
lessons.english: What's more, our first battle is to defeat that dragon!

lessons.japanese: われわれは彼の家のねずみを退治した。
lessons.english: We got rid of the mice in his house.

lessons.japanese: 大きな蜘蛛が部屋にいるの！早く退治してちょうだい！
lessons.english: There's a huge spider in the room! Quick, exterminate it!
